aim: The purpose of the Foundation is to contribute to the sustainable development and progress of the living standards in the country.
focus: Zamin Foundation focuses on the long-term, strategically important and sustainable projects by supporting:
name: The name of the foundation \"Zamin\" in translation from Uzbek means the basis, platform and opportunity for growth.
innovation: Innovative technologies in the social sphere
program: Educational Development Programme for Deaf & Hard of Hearing
deputy_job: Chief Researcher of the Institute for Strategic and Interregional Studies under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Doctor of Law
member: Member of the Board of Trustees
member_1_job: Project Manager of the Scientific Research Institute of Forestry, Doctor of Agricultural Sciences
member_2_job: Deputy Director, Chief Medical Officer of the Republican Specialized Scientific and Practical Medical Center of Pediatrics, Doctor of Medical Sciences
